core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Po indicates that (in the state which it symbolises) it will not be advantageous to make a movement in any direction whatever.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Systems are rotting from the bottom up. Surfaces may still look intact, but the structure is failing. This is not a time to advance. Pull back, reduce exposure, and let decay complete so that what is false can fall away.

translations.text: The first SIX, divided, shows one overturning the couch by injuring its legs. (The injury will go on to) the destruction of (all) firm correctness, and there will be evil.

lines.normalized_meaning: Decay begins at the base. Attacking the foundation leads to total loss of integrity. If you keep participating in this erosion, it turns to misfortune.

translations.text: The second SIX, divided, shows one overthrowing the couch by injuring its frame. (The injury will go on to) the destruction of (all) firm correctness, and there will be evil.

lines.normalized_meaning: The rot spreads into the frame. Staying loyal to what’s collapsing will only drag you down with it. Persistence here is not virtue — it’s self-ruin.

translations.text: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject among the overthrowers; but there will be no error.

lines.normalized_meaning: You take part in stripping away what’s corrupt. At this point, removing the failing structure is not a crime — it’s necessary and you’re not blamed.

translations.text: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject having overthrown the couch, and (going to injure) the skin (of him who lies on it). There will be evil.

lines.normalized_meaning: The collapse is now cutting into living flesh. You’re in direct danger. At this range the decay is harmful, not theoretical — staying means injury.

translations.text: The fifth SIX, divided, shows (its subject leading on the others like) a string of fishes, and (obtaining for them) the favour that lights on the inmates of the palace. There will be advantage in every way.
六五：貫魚，以宮人寵，無不利。

lines.normalized_meaning: Move in quiet formation, stay coordinated, and accept protection from someone within the center of power. Humble, orderly alignment under shelter is fortunate.

translations.text: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject (as) a great fruit which has not been eaten. The superior man finds (the people again) as a chariot carrying him. The small men (by their course) overthrow their own dwellings.
上九：碩果不食，君子得輿，小人剝廬。

lines.normalized_meaning: After the stripping-away, something valuable remains untouched. The worthy regain support and are carried forward. The corrupt destroy their own shelter.
